RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 1 5F Dirt CR: 84. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 17800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $16,000. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 30, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $16,000). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run atFi ve Furlongs.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MIDNIGHT HURRICANE just off leaders to the stretch, rallied along off rail, drove past. SCOOTERANDDABIGMAN stumbled from the gate, regrouped with no speed off rail run with a late gain in stretch. THATSAFACTJACK quick to duel throughout, stayed game for show spot at wire. BAYTOWN WARRIOR outside dueled, to the stretch gamely, weakened in late going. ALL JOKES ASIDE inside position while never far back, leveled off in the stretch. DAY IN THE COUNTRY bumped with winner from the gate and slow into stride and ran on with no late gain in the stretch while in tight the final seventy yards. TENPAK never close throughout. EL GAVILAN through early dropped well back from the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: All Jokes Aside
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside position while never far back, leveled off in the stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Thatsafactjack
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick to duel throughout, stayed game for show spot at wire

ENTRY.NAME: Midnight Hurricane
ENTRY.COMMENT: exchanged bumps start, rallied into stretch drove past

ENTRY.NAME: Day in the Country
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped out of the gate with no late gain in the stretch

ENTRY.NAME: El Gavilan
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early dropped well back from the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Tenpak
ENTRY.OWNER: Megson Berva Tennant Angela and Tennant Kurt
ENTRY.COMMENT: never close throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Scooteranddabigman
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled start, no speed off rail run with a late gain in stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Baytown Warrior
ENTRY.OWNER: McEntee Racing Inc and Resolute Racing Alliance LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: outside dueled, to the stretch gamely, weakened in late going

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 64. Claiming Purse 15500. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since August 30, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Claiming Races For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility) (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $6,250).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STATUS SYMBOL lunged at the start, regrouped quickly. tracked leaders to the turn, took over three wide drew clear. BEEBLEGEE off rail run to the stretch, rallied along for the place spot. LA LA ANGEL raced along evenly with no response when needed. CONGRATS JENSEN inside speed, dueled, to the stretch, could not keep up late. THE LAST APPLE speed inside to turn with a steady fade back galloped past wire.

ENTRY.NAME: La La Angel
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly with no response when needed

ENTRY.NAME: Congrats Jensen
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed, dueled, to the stretch, could not keep up late

ENTRY.NAME: The Last Apple
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed inside to turn, with a steady fade back galloped past wire

ENTRY.NAME: Beeblegee
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail run to the stretch, rallied along for the place spot

ENTRY.NAME: Status Symbol
ENTRY.COMMENT: lunged at start, tracked, took over three wide drew clear

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 51. Maiden Claiming Purse 9000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PONDERED speed to the front, opened a large lead down the backstretch, held sway. EXPLOSIVE SKIES speed between horses first turn, inside chase no match while best of the rest. TOTAL SMOKESHOW inside run while evenly between horses early, stayed third. DISHIN' IT OUT no speed throughout but did improve position only in the stretch. AWESOME MARINA broke slow from the gate, saved ground to no avail throughout. PLEASANT SKY slammed rival out of gate, raced off rail trip throughout, empty at the half and faded far back. DOGWOODS BECCA chased winner to the half, came up empty, dropped far back.

ENTRY.NAME: Total Smokeshow
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside run while evenly between horses early, stayed third

ENTRY.NAME: Awesome Marina
ENTRY.COMMENT: slammed hard from gate, saved ground to no avail throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Pleasant Sky
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore in slammed rival from the gate empty at the half faded

ENTRY.NAME: Explosive Skies
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed between horses first turn, inside chase no match 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Dishin' It Out
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed throughout but did improve position only in the stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Dogwoods Becca
ENTRY.OWNER: Scott Anthony L Scott Chris L and Scott Mindy
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased winner to the half, came up empty, dropped far back

ENTRY.NAME: Pondered
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the front wide, opened large lead backstretch, held sway

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Fred W. Hertrich III & John D. Fielding

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 67. Allowance Purse 26700. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OPTIONAL, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A MileOr Over Since August 30, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WETZEL secured good position throughout, rallied into the stretch to go clear in the late stages under good handling to the wire. WEEKENDER within striking distance throughout, forged to a late lead in the stretch but could not last and run down late. LEROYISALAGNIAPPE speed to the front, stayed to eighth pole, wilted inside late. HONOR THE D saved ground throughout with no late kick in the stretch run. PALACE TEMPTATION lunged at the start losing best chance, saved ground throughout while never a real threat. HEIDI'S SINATRA never menaced throughout. ROAD TO MUSIC CITY brief speed inside, gave way readily with little resistance. MURRY SPUR never in the hunt throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Palace Temptation
ENTRY.COMMENT: lunged, hopped from gate, saved ground throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Road to Music City
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed inside, gave way readily with little resistance

ENTRY.NAME: Murry Spur
ENTRY.COMMENT: never in the hunt throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Weekender
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, forged to a late lead, run down late

ENTRY.NAME: Wetzel
ENTRY.OWNER: Pickerrell William D Pickerrell Joe and Cline Robert C
ENTRY.COMMENT: secured good position throughout, rallied to go clear late stages

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Pick View LLC, Paul W. Schaffer & William D. Pickerrell

ENTRY.NAME: Honor the D
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground throughout with no late kick in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Leroyisalagniappe
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the front, stayed to eighth pole, wilted inside late

ENTRY.NAME: Heidi's Sinatra
ENTRY.OWNER: Eyerman, Lee J. and Molumby, John
ENTRY.COMMENT: never menaced throughout

RACE.FOOTNOTES: GRAN CHEMIN under restraint off rail to the half, rallied on stretch in time. RECOGNIZE ME inside speed to the front, led to the stretch run down at wire. CARIBBEAN NIGHT lunged from the gate, trailed to far turn, rallied on to beat one. LOTTA ROSES inside position to far turn with no late response when needed.

Claiming Price $16,000 (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $16,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: QUICKY DESIRE good position to the half just off leaders, took over and ran clear under good handling to the wire. MISS MOON PIE chased pace throughout to no avail, no match for winner stretch. BUCKEYE BLING raced along evenly for the show spot no match for top pair. DIALED INNA raced along evenly from inside throughout while no menace. LA ROSA rushed to the front stayed to the half with nothing left. PARFAIT had a slight bobble from the gate and never factored. MEGAN'S NOEL always trailed.

Non-winners Of Two Races Since August 30, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances ) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at Five Furlongs.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SAY IT AIN'T SO perfect spot throughout, roused three wide stretch to go clear. FLY FLY AWAY dueled early, backed off to turn, angled inside, late run for place. HINK'S PALADIN speed to the stretch off rail, stayed game but outfinished late. ERIC THE SALESMAN outsprinted from the gate and always trailed.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 86. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 14400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $10,000. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since August 30, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Claiming Races For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FIRST KITTEN speed to duel between horses to the turn, roused to go clear in the final sixteenth under stout handling to the wire. JOLIE RULER no speed while outside with late run in stretch while coming on late best of the rest. ERV'S WENCH showed no speed to the stretch on the wrong lead, split horses into the lane, changed leads late with a burst to the wire for the show dough. MY TOMMY LEE unhurried early while saving ground, kept on to improve late. KNOT WILD could not keep up with no response in the stretch run. SUPORB tried hard from outside to the stretch, could not keep up faded. FUTURE FLAY shuffled back to the turn never factored. SIS BOOM BOB squeezed out of the gate, rushed, showed speed to the front dueled to the half with nothing left. MERRY OF SOUL chased top trio to the turn with nothing left and faltered back.

ENTRY.NAME: My Tommy Lee
ENTRY.COMMENT: saving ground throughout, kept on to improve in late going

ENTRY.NAME: Merry of Soul
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased top trio to the turn with nothing left and faltered back

ENTRY.NAME: First Kitten
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to duel between horses to the turn, roused to go clear

ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, split horses changed leads with a late burst to wire

ENTRY.COMMENT: shuffled back to the turn never factored
